detail_desc: Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband.

Shorts in a linen and cotton blend with concealed, adjustable elastication and a drawstring at the waist and a zip fly and press-stud. Diagonal front pockets, welt back pockets and a small fabric appliqué at the hem of one leg.

Hooded sports jacket in fast-drying functional fabric. Zip down the front with a chin guard, kangaroo pockets and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.

Hooded sports jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a soft brushed inside and contrasting colour stripes down the sleeves. Small stand-up collar, a zip down the front with a chin guard, side pockets and a narrow trim around the hood, cuffs and hem.

Set with a top and pair of leggings in fast-drying functional fabric. Wide top in closely-woven mesh with a round neckline, print motif on the front, cap sleeves and a gently rounded hem. Leggings with a print on one leg and a contrasting colour waist panel.

Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with twisted seams and contrasting colour mesh sections at the sides. Round neck with narrow ribbing and short raglan sleeves.

Short, fitted dress in woven fabric made from a cotton blend with a slight sheen. Layered at the top with a wide flounce that covers one shoulder. Gathered seam at one side for a draped effect and a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at the other side. Jersey lining.

Short, fitted dress in woven fabric made from a cotton blend with a slight sheen. Layered at the top with a wide flounce that covers one shoulder. Gathered seam at one side for a draped effect and a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at the other side. Jersey lining.

Padded mittens in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams, elastication at the wrists and a hook and loop fastening at the top. Size 2-6M with no thumbs. Soft fleece lining.The mittens have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Padded mittens in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams, elastication at the wrists and a hook and loop fastening at the top. Size 2-6M with no thumbs. Soft fleece lining.The mittens have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Notch lapels, concealed press-studs at the front, shoulder pads and long sleeves with a slit at the cuffs. Tapered waist, discreet front pockets and a single back vent. Lined.

Bootees in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams and reflective details. Elastication at the back of the heels and a hook and loop fastening at the front of the shaft. Soft fleece linings and insoles and soft soles. The bootees have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Bootees in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams and reflective details. Elastication at the back of the heels and a hook and loop fastening at the front of the shaft. Soft fleece linings and insoles and soft soles. The bootees have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
V-neck blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with darts at the back, a gathered, elasticated seam at the front and long puff sleeves with a covered button at the cuffs.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with ribbed details. Padded cups and wide, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back. Covered elastication at the hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Extra firm support.
Long top in soft, ribbed jersey with a wide neckline, dropped shoulders, long sleeves, high slits in the sides and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.

Short, one-shoulder dress in imitation leather with a concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and one shoulder strap with a knot detail.
Ankle-length trousers in an airy viscose weave with elastication at the back of the waist and a sewn-on fabric tie belt at the front. Side pockets and wide, straight legs.

Gently flared blouse in a crêpe weave with a V-neck and buttons down the front. Gathered seams on the shoulders and lower section, decorative, gathered ties at the front, darts at the back and a button at the cuffs.
